title: Will PBE Signup Be Open Anytime Soon?????
body: Will PBE Signup Be Open Anytime Soon????? beacuse i have been waiting for a very long time with this system and i think you should open it sometime soon atleast for a while

replies.body: Applications are currently being accepted, though we can't expedite or force admissions to the PBE.  You can sign up for the PBE [here](https://pbesignup.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe), just in case.  Though we can't guarantee accepted, I wish you the best of luck!
